Description.Text: The Windermere is an award winning, small London hotel of enormous charm and character, where the atmosphere is relaxed and friendly. Having established a wide reputation, many of the guests are introduced by personal recommendation, a tribute to the individual care and attention given to all.

Located in the heart of London - a city that is flourishing as never before - guests are within easy reach of London's attractions. Buckingham Palace and the glorious Royal Parks are just a short walk away. Within 1 mile you can discover Westminster Abbey, The Houses of Parliament, Downing Street, The Cabinet War Rooms and the Tate Gallery. Both the Queen Elizabeth II Conference Centre and the Horticultural Halls are within walking distance. The world famous "Theatreland" district and "The City", London's financial district, are accessible by public transport or are just a short taxi ride away. Within a mile and a half you can explore the world renowned department stores of Harrods and Harvey Nichols along with the designer shops of Sloane Square and Knightsbridge. The inspiring Saatchi Gallery and the shopping boutiques of Duke of York's Square, Sloane Street and the iconic King's Road are just a short walk away.

Classic Double - Double bed, en suite shower room (shower & WC). Room amenities include: tea/coffee making facilities, laptop sized safe, hairdryer, flatscreen TV with digital channels, telephone, free WI-FI & wake-up service.
Classic Twin - Two single beds, en suite shower room (shower & WC). Room amenities include: tea/coffee making facilities, laptop sized safe, hairdryer, flatscreen TV with digital channels, telephone, free WI-FI & wake-up service.
Superior Double - One king or queen size bed, en suite bathroom (bathtub with shower & WC). Room amenities include: tea/coffee making facilities, laptop sized safe, hairdryer, flatscreen TV with digital channels, telephone, free WI-FI & wake-up service.
Superior Twin - Two single beds, en suite bathroom (bathtub with shower & WC). Room amenities include: tea/coffee making facilities, laptop sized safe, hairdryer, flatscreen TV with digital channels, telephone, free WI-FI & wake-up service.
Deluxe Double - One king or queen size bed, en suite bathroom (bathtub with shower & WC). Room amenities include: tea/coffee making facilities, laptop sized safe, hairdryer, flatscreen TV with digital channels, telephone, free WI-FI & wake-up service.
Deluxe Twin - Two single beds, en suite bathroom (bathtub with shower & WC). Room amenities include: tea/coffee making facilities, laptop sized safe, hairdryer, flatscreen TV with digital channels, telephone, free WI-FI & wake-up service.
Triple - 3 single beds, or 1 single & 1 double bed (subject to availability), en suite shower room (shower & WC). Room amenities include: tea/coffee making facilities, laptop sized safe, hairdryer, flatscreen TV with digital channels, telephone, free WI-FI & wake-up service.
